item.title: Investment Opportunities in LouderVoice
item.description: For Irish taxpayers, we have just kicked off our BES 2008 offering which is built around theÂ LouderVoiceÂ B2B Services. If you are interested in hearing more about this investment opportunity or discussing direct equity investment, please contact Conor O’Neill on conor AT loudervoice DOT com or +353-87-9790297.
